title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-2.3 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-2.3 - Penalties

State Regulations
A violation of any provision of this Subpart is subject to all civil and criminal penalties as provided for by law. For purposes of civil penalties, each day that a place of business fails to post signage required by this Subpart shall constitute a separate violation under this Subpart

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
9-2.3

Adopted

New

York State Register February 5, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 05, eff. 2/5/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
